answers.answer: honestly, majority of people fail the test....i passed and my doctor was surprised..she said its very common to fail the one hour test...but easy to pass the 3 hour test...trust me, DO NOT STRESS OVER IT!! i passed the 1 hour bc my body handles sugar REALLLLLYYYYY well....but dont worry...youll honestly pass the 3 hour :)
Ya don't be too worried and if you don't pass the 3 hour it's not the worst thing in the world to have gestational diabetes, it ***** but its not the worst thing. Good luck

question: Im a very small girl so I honestly thought I would pass my tests with flying colors....yesterday I took the one hour test and failed...what are the honest chances I will also fail my 3 hour one...I hadn't eaten before takin the test
title: glucose test
